data.text: Be koai e dugu anga ia gi Dimaadua e benebene,
Tangada deelaa e mee di helekai gi Mee,
Mee ga benebene mai goe gi daha mo nia mee hagalliga huogodoo ala e de gidee,
Mee gaa gahu goe gi ono bakau, gei Mee ga benebene goe hagahumalia.
Gei goe ga hagalee madagu i nia mee balua i di boo,
be nia hagadilinga magi ala e tale adu hagalimalima i lodo di bouli,
Dolomaa, nia daangada e mana gaa tinga gi lala i doo baahi guu mmade,
Goe gaa mmada ga gidee nia daangada huaidu ala ma ga hagaduadua.
Goe guu hai Dimaadua go doo duuli,
Deai di haingadaa e tale adu gi di goe ai,
God ga dugu adu ana daangada di langi e madamada humalia i di goe,
Digaula ga daahi goe gi nua gi nadau lima
Goe ga dagadagahi nia laion mono gihaa,
Dimaadua ga helekai, “Au ga benebene digau ala e aloho i di Au,
Digaula ma gaa gahi Au, gei Au gaa hila ang gi digaula.
Au gaa dugu ang gi digaula gi mouli waalooloo. Au ga benebene digaula.”
